# Vim Hotkey Reference

## General

- `:PIU` full plugin install/update/upgrade/remote
- `<f6>` toggle spellcheck:
- `<leader>`:
  - `sn` next spelling error
  - `sp` previous spelling error
  - `sa` add spelling
  - `ss` search for similarly spelled words
  - `fs` ranger
  - `FS` ranger new tab
  - `sv` reload nvim config
  - `cd` set directory to current file's directory
  - `z` save file
  - `Z` save and quit
  - `a` select all
  - `<leader>`:
    - `Z` quit all
- `<localleader>`:
  - `xl` lex file system
  - `xh` hex file system
  - `xs` sex file system
